author: jvanzyl
msg: o Removing velocity generation. James and I have decided we're going to
go with the full bean solution and work with that.

author: jstrachan
msg: * Reoganized the SqlBuilder code a bit to make it easier to derive and use.
* added an IO package to hide the details of using Betwixt with commons-sql
* the basic Oracle, MSSql, MySql and Sybase builders seem to work fine now
* moved the Ant tasks which depend on Velocity/Texen into a seperate package, so its easy to know which Ant tasks can be used with just commons code and which requires Velocity/Texen
Right now I don't think the Velocity tasks are working on the new commons-sql model.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o Removing the duplicate column type information being produced.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added initial cut of a little builder library that uses regular Java code to generate the DDL to create/drop/alter tables against various physical databases.
This was mostly done as an experiment to see how it compares to the Velocity version, just for the DDL generation as I need to programatically, at runtime, create tables.
Also added a couple of helper methods to the model beans.
